title: Rumpelstiltskin
subtle: Fairy Tale (fiction), 1,550 words, Level W (Grade 4), Lexile 880L
description: Rumpelstiltskin is the retelling of the classic German fairy tale in which the daughter of a poor miller finds herself in the hands of a wicked king who commands her to spin straw into gold thread. Unable to complete this impossible task, Evaline descends into despair until a strange little man comes to her aid--but at what cost? The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze plot and to summarize a text.
highFrequencyWords: callous, compensation, deftness, fanciful, devastation, gnome, ominous, ordeal, precious, spindle, spinning wheel, transform
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
awareness: Synonyms and Antonyms                : Identify and understand synonyms and antonyms
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
